rooms.description: A spacious entrance with natural light and Vastu-compliant design.
Open living area with traditional Chettinad motifs, natural lighting from windows facing east as per Vastu.
Adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring seamless flow and positive energy circulation.
Modern amenities integrated with traditional design elements, functional layout.
A bedroom for occasional guests, designed for comfort and privacy.
Spacious master suite with attached bathroom, designed with Vastu principles in mind.
Well-appointed bathroom in proximity to master bedroom and living space.

openings.details: Large entrance door with traditional Chettinad design, ensuring secure and inviting access.
Double garage doors for two-car parking integrated into the main floor plan.
Large windows that allow ample natural light, oriented east and north per Vastu guidelines.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard acting as the heart of the home, promoting airflow and natural illumination.

garage.details: Integrated two-car garage with secure access from the side entrance.

rooms.description: Expansive suite including a private bathroom and dressing area, designed with Vastu principles for restful sleep.
Additional bedroom maintaining privacy and comfort.
Cozy space for children with ample light and ventilation.
Shared bathroom designed for convenience on the upper floor.

openings.location: Adjacent to master bedroom and kids' bedroom
openings.details: Provides outdoor space and natural ventilation, enhancing overall quality of living.
Large windows ensuring abundant daylight and airflow per Vastu guidelines.

rooftop_terrace.description: Rooftop terrace designed for relaxation with views of the courtyard, includes seating areas and green space.
